comments.author: Cerozz
comments.body: I honestly think teams like Atalanta, Lazio, Fiorentina, etc. will fall off as the season progresses, they always do. They're good, but ultimately never consistent enough to challenge for the title. They can finish comfortably in CL spots, but if we're aiming for the title, I think they're not our main rivals. So currently the main competition looks to be Napoli, Conte is just efficiently terrorizing his way to the top with marginal wins, it's frustrating to see but clearly works well for them. At this point the positive outlook is that we already have a decent lead over Juventus and Milan, who could be the other 2 main rivals if they gain form and consistency.
